scenes.background: You offered to help Monica manage her workload. Bob later comments:
scenes.description: So, now youre doing Monicas job too?

options.text: Just trying to be a team player. We all need to support each other.
options.analysis: You emphasized teamwork and empathy, showing strong social skills, but slightly lower self-regulation.

options.text: Monica was overloaded, so I thought it was best to help her prioritize.
options.analysis: You explained your rationale calmly, demonstrating good perception and motivation, but empathy could be stronger.

options.text: If you're concerned, maybe you can assist Monica instead.
options.analysis: You redirected the suggestion to Bob, showing strong motivation but lower empathy and perception.
